item.title: Operation and maintenance automation -- Ansible
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. Operation and maintenance automation application scenarios OS preparation automation Batch OS deployment to hosts. PXE Configuration automation Perform batch configuration on hosts or batch configuration on host applications. Ansible, saltstack, puppet. Ansible, using the ssh protocol, works out of the box. Saltstack requires the cooperation of the agent side, and the configuration and deployment are fast. Puppet, an old-fashioned configuration automation tool, requires the cooperation of agents. Improve configuration efficiency and reduce manual involvement.
